Approaches focused on the NOR Implementation
Approaches focused on the NOR type
None of the approaches propose 
a set of re-engineering patterns 
to guide the re-engineering process.
They do not take into account the 
Non-Ontological Resource 
data model, an important artifact 
in the re-engineering process.
